entities.name: Basic Castle Key
entities.description: A standard metal key. Accesses a room others are not meant to.

entities.name: Storage Key
entities.description: This key has "brooms" engraved into it.

entities.name: Boss Chest Key
entities.description: For a boss chest key, it doesn't appear very different from a normal key.

entities.name: Treasure Chest Key
entities.description: Your key to riches and glory!
